title: Witchcraft through the ages
itunes:title: Witchcraft through the ages
itunes:subtitle: We speak to Professor Ronald Hutton about his new book The Witch, which reveals how societies throughout the globe have lived in fear of witchcraft for more than 2,000 years
description:
We speak to Professor Ronald Hutton about his new book The Witch, which reveals how societies throughout the globe have lived in fear of witchcraft for more than 2,000 years

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
